price: Nyankopͻn kyerεkyerε Ne nsεm no mu kyerε mo. Nyankopͻn ne Onimdefoͻ, Ɔne Onyansafoͻ.
arabic: وَيُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayubayyinu al-lahu lakumu al-āyāti wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
